data.meta_site_name: CXI Brand talks | Corporate and Brand Identity Conference
data.text:
Oliver is an award-winning creative director with more than 20 years of experience in design and branding. Originally trained as a sculptor, Oliver has a broad and multi-disciplinary approach to branding.

Oliver has led teams for renowned branding agencies in The Netherlands, UK and Sweden, such as Studio Dumbar, Wolff Olins and Bold Scandinavia. He has created brand identities and experiences for global clients from all industries (a.o. Google, Apple, Tesco, Mercedes Benz, Olafur Eliasson, Berlin Philharmonics, Amsterdam Sinfonietta, Minecraft).

Throughout the years Oliver has been teaching and giving talks and lectures around the world. Alongside his commercial clients he regularly initiates design projects, like the award-winning Book of Paper, the kidswear brand Beep, or his wooden Totem sculptures.
